thread.title: Jimmy Kimmel Does NOT Hold Back as He Completely Roasts Matt Damon at the Oscars
thread.title_full: Jimmy Kimmel Does NOT Hold Back as He Completely Roasts Matt Damon at the Oscars

author: Kelsie Gibson
title: Jimmy Kimmel Does NOT Hold Back as He Completely Roasts Matt Damon at the Oscars
text:
Jimmy Kimmel Making Fun of Matt Damon at the 2017 Oscars Jimmy Kimmel Does NOT Hold Back as He Completely Roasts Matt Damon at the Oscars February 26, 2017 by Kelsie Gibson 9 Shares . @JimmyKimmel roasts Matt Damon: "I've known Matt so long, when I first met Matt I was the fat one." https://t.co/LOhkJ3ZP65 #Oscars pic.twitter.com/LyJYpj9nso 
â€” ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2017 
Jimmy Kimmel and Matt Damon's feud was alive and well during the Oscars on Sunday night. During Jimmy's opening monologue, the late-night host couldn't help but poke fun at his frenemy. After making a few cheap digs about his appearance, he went all in as he critiqued his decision to star in The Great Wall over the Oscar-nominated Manchester by the Sea . "He handed that part to his friend and took a Chinese ponytail movie," he said, referencing best actor nominee Casey Affleck . "That movie went on to lose $80 million. Smooth move, dumbass." Ouch! We can't wait to see what other hilarious jokes Jimmy will come up with during the show.
